name: DieTetris
description:
Welcome to DieTetris!

DieTetris is a fun new puzzle game inspired by the likes of Tetris and Puyo Puyo, where you roll the dice to change their faces and make matches!

Dice will slowly fall from the top of the screen. Flip and rotate the dice around to land them in the perfect spot and make matches. Matching dice with the same face will make them vanish and give you points! 

Win extra points by making bigger matches, double matches, combos, and clearing the board!

As you progress, the game will increase in difficulty by adding new shapes and dice colors!

Try to make as many matches as you can and beat our high scores!

Controls:
  • Left and Right keys to move and flip the dice.
  • Up and Down keys to rotate the dice.
  • Space Bar to instantly drop the dice to the floor.
Requirements:
  • A keyboard.
  • A love for puzzle games.
Music Credits
  • Laser Groove - Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com). Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License. http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
  • Cyberpunk Moonlight Sonata - Joth. https://opengameart.org/users/joth
SFX Credits

  • https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/
